page.title: 10EDUCATION - 1
page.content: { {An interview with Mr. Hampson, head of {Cartmel Priory Comprehensive School. The school was opened by Princess Margaret on 15th October 1958. Mr. Hampson has been head since 1971. There are 390 full time pupils and 26 full time staff. There are 24 prefects in the fifth form, and they organise rotas. Shool trips are taken in France, Germany and Bulgaria. Many sports are included in the timetable, including - basketball, badminton, judo, orinteering, trampolining gymnastics, cricket and athletics. Mr Hampson teaches some geography and mathematics He enjoys his job. {Interviewed by Neil Hunt and Jamie {Mullagh, aged 9 }
